DOC.brief_summary: The objective study : 1 . To collect data necessary assess performance advance Vaginal Tactile Imager ( VTI ) evaluate probe ergonomic design , safety patient tolerance ; 2 . To assess clinical suitability interface software facilitate data collection process get vivo examination data validation visualization analysis routine ; 3 . To test data collection technique establish reliable examination procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Study With Advanced Vaginal Tactile Imager
DOC.criteria: Adult woman ( age 21 ) fall within one follow group : 1 . No evidence pelvic floor disorder prior pelvic surgery ; 2 . Stage 1 2 pelvic organ prolapse affect one vaginal compartment . 1 . Active skin infection ulceration within vagina 2 . Presence vaginal septum ; 3 . Active cancer colon , rectum wall , cervix , vaginal , uterus bladder ; 4 . Ongoing radiation therapy pelvic cancer ; 5 . Impacted stool ; 6 . Recent ( less three month ) pelvic surgery ; 7 . Significant preexist pelvic pain include levator ani syndrome , severe vaginismus vulvodynia ; 8 . Severe hemorrhoid ; 9 . Surgically absent rectum bladder ; 10 . Significant circulatory cardiac condition could cause excessive risk examination determine attend physician .
